t: Amazon.com : The Hair Edit Knot Links : Beauty & Personal Care
Amazon.com : The Hair Edit Hoop & Pin : Beauty & Personal Care
s: I really like this brand, they have really cute hair accessories. This hoop and pin hair accessory is simple and cute. It’s easy to use and holds my hair in place well. This accessory is mostly for half up hair styles. I have thick hair, so I am not able to hold all of my hair up with this hoop and pin. Maybe you could if you had short thinner hair? Very cute, definitely recommend ... This Hair Edit ...
